TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AddInBaseAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AddInBaseAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AddInBaseAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 將物件識別為管線的增益集檢視區段。

span.span: Identifies an object as an add-in view segment of the pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法，維持可用的管線區段的相關資訊的存放區，使用這個屬性來識別增益集檢視。The and methods, which maintain the store of information about available pipeline segments, use this attribute to identify an add-in view. 若要建構管線，增益集繼承自增益集檢視中的型別由屬性，稱為增益集基底。To construct the pipeline, the type in the add-in view that the add-in inherits from is identified by the attribute and is called the add-in base. 這個屬性應該用於只啟用管線區段的類型。This attribute should be used only on types that activate the segments of the pipeline. 代表主機和增益集之間傳遞的物件型別不需要這個屬性。Types that represent objects passed between the host and the add-in do not need this attribute. ## Examples 下列範例會識別的增益集基底類別的增益集檢視管線區段。The following example identifies the add-in base class for an add-in view pipeline segment. [!code-csharp[AddInP1AddInViews#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInViews/cs/Calc1AddInView.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP1AddInViews#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInP1AddInViews/vb/Calc1AddInView.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定一個或多個增益集基底型別，可供單一增益集端配接器用於建構管線。

span.span: Gets or sets one or more add-in base types that a single add-in-side adapter can use to construct the pipeline.

value.span: 增益集基底型別的陣列。

span.span: An array of add-in base types.
